title: Worlds 2015 to be held in Europe

replies.body: *Insert joke about euw servers here*
EUW servers are so bad it goes down more then your girlfriend with your best friend
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
SHOTS FIRED. ROCKETS LAUNCHED. PREDATOR MISSILE ENGAGED
no scoped
#fazeclan
"SHOTS FIRED"{{champion:18}}
{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
TACTICAL NUKE INCOMING!!!!!
O BABY A TRIPLEEEE
Right in the {{champion:85}}
EUW servers are so bad they crash more than women drivers
Will the pro's lag?
is u stupid!?

> is u stupid

> is u stupid

> is u stupid

> ***IS U STUPID***


...
{{champion:412}}  Ahhah.. quite likely.
No, they use the best possible servers for lcs
its lan u fukn idiot
lan doesnt exist in EUW

So Riot does have better severs available what keeping them from making rest of the servers better. {{item:2050}} {{item:2049}}{{item:2049}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}}{{summoner:2}} .... They have spoken.
Don't you mean {{item:2050}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2045}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}} {{summoner:2}} ?
No, the pros don't lag. The play on an offline sever that is specially made for the event.
AKA lan...
YESSSSSSS FINALLY! GOT STATIONED IN GERMANY AND FINALLY GET TO SEE A CHAMPIONSHIP!!!!!! CHEAAAA!!! LOL.
Thank you for your service. <3

{{champion:161}} 
Thank you for your... *contribution*.

While you're there; some snacks to buy/try in Germany:
Anything from Haribo, Fanta (much better there, esp. when mixed with cola), Maltz beer, milche schnitte, paprika chips, potato pancakes (reibekuchen), and anything made by the company Müller.

this is confirmed true!
no artificial coloring in German gummy stuff = much better taste!
Maybe this will give us an advantage over the Koreans.....Maybe...
I thought you guys were still trying to get an advantage over the Brasil huehuehue{{champion:82}}
Maybe Jesus is black...
Given the time period and the geographic region in which he lived, it's not at all unlikely.
Thank you...a time zone where i can actually watch the games!
Will depend on what time the matches are for us in NA. *sigh*
Hopefully. I just had alot of trouble waking up at 3 am then staying up until 11am and then going to class watching the matches. i fell asleep alot lol.
What?! You had trouble watching a game at 3 IN THE DAMN MORNING?! Pfft casual.
It will be! IDK what part of NA you live in but on the west coast where Rito is its only 8 AM.
very true i forgot they use pacific time thanks for pointing that out i think you should comment that so that way people know
Will it ever be in California
It was at the Staples center in S3 lol
lol a place i can speak to the locals in a language they understand
{{item:3157}} Time to get my tickets!!! *looks in empty wallet that was used to buy RP for skins and poro wards* Well shit Riot, make up your mind.
I thought Season 5 began today..
It does!
do you know at what time?
I can feel the lag already.
Woah, I haven't seen something like that since Faker did penta 1vs5 {{champion:119}}
I say Good Show.
